content.p: How to keep your devices secure using the latest software. If you are a student, don't delay installing security software and app updates on your computer, phone or tablet. Install updates as soon as they are available to keep your devices secure. If you are a member of staff: If you have trouble downloading or installing updates on any of your devices, contact our IT support teams. You should be notified when a software update is available for your Apple device. Install the update immediately. You can also manually check for software updates by going to Settings > General > Software Update. To install app updates, go to ‘Updates’ in the App Store and press ‘Update All’ to get the latest version of each app. You can also change your settings so that apps update automatically, as soon as a new version is available. In ‘Settings’ go to ‘iTunes and App Store’ and then press the switch next to ’Updates’. If you want the updates to only download when you have access to wifi, leave the ‘Use Mobile Data’ option unselected. If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
